pages.title: In Bloom
pages.text: A-ha! I was right! Those $(item)Mystical Mushrooms$() are a perfect substitute for $(item)Mystical Petals$(). I was worried there'd be no such materials left in existence, but with these, I can begin to teach you the Botanical Magicks. $(br) The first thing you'll need to do is craft a special basin, called a $(item)Petal Apothecary$().
Using it, you can then combine four of those $(item)White Mushrooms$() with some seeds to form a $(item)Pure Daisy$().

pages.heading: Pure Daisy
pages.description: Add $(item)Water$(), then drop $(item)Mushrooms$() in, and finish by dropping in any $(item)Seed$().

pages.heading: Livingwood
pages.description: Works with all $(item)Wood Logs$() and $(item)Foggy Stones$() from the $(thing)Misty World$().
